name: EnergeticLighting
0:
”Alexa ask clever bonny to turn on the lamp”
”Alexa ask clever bonny to turn off the lamp”
”Alexa ask clever bonny to change the lamp to sleep”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: clever bonny
des: Through Alexa and Energetic Lighting to control your sunlight lights, you can control lights, rooms, scene mode, linkage and status. First, select the Energetic Lighting skills in Alexa, click the "start skill" button to connect your sunshine lighting account, and say "Alexa, ask clever bonny", and now you can start to control your device.
